Admin tools second set

## /rp player set_buy_date

**Usage**

- `/rp player set_buy_date user:<user> message_id:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `user` | `user` | Yes | The user. | - |
| `message_id` | `string` | Yes | The message id when they bought their minion. | - |

## /rp player viewbank

**Usage**

- `/rp player viewbank user:<user> [json:<boolean>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `user` | `user` | Yes | The user. | - |
| `json` | `boolean` | No | Get bank in JSON format | - |

## /rp player add_patron_time

**Usage**

- `/rp player add_patron_time user:<user> tier:<integer> time:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `user` | `user` | Yes | The user. | - |
| `tier` | `integer` | Yes | The tier to give. | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 |
| `time` | `string` | Yes | The time. | - |

## /rp player unequip_all_items

**Usage**

- `/rp player unequip_all_items user:<user> [gear_setup:<string>] [all:<boolean>] [pet:<boolean>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `user` | `user` | Yes | The user. | - |
| `gear_setup` | `string` | No | The gear setup you want to select. | - |
| `all` | `boolean` | No | Unequip all gear slots | - |
| `pet` | `boolean` | No | Unequip pet also? | - |

## /rp player steal_items

**Usage**

- `/rp player steal_items user:<user> [items:<string>] [item_filter:<string>] [reason:<string>] [delete:<boolean>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `user` | `user` | Yes | The user | - |
| `items` | `string` | No | The items to take | - |
| `item_filter` | `string` | No | A preconfigured item filter. | 1 options (see autocomplete) |
| `reason` | `string` | No | The reason | - |
| `delete` | `boolean` | No | To delete the items instead | - |

## /rp player migrate_user

**Usage**

- `/rp player migrate_user source:<user> dest:<user> [reason:<string>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `source` | `user` | Yes | Source account with data to preserve and migrate | - |
| `dest` | `user` | Yes | Destination account (any existing data on this account will be deleted) | - |
| `reason` | `string` | No | The reason | - |

## /rp player list_trades

**Usage**

- `/rp player list_trades user:<user> [partner:<user>] [guild_id:<string>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `user` | `user` | Yes | The user | - |
| `partner` | `user` | No | Optional second user, will only show trades between the users | - |
| `guild_id` | `string` | No | Optional - Restrict search to this guild. | - |

## /rp user_event max_total

**Usage**

- `/rp user_event max_total user:<user> type:<string> message_id:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `user` | `user` | Yes | The user that reached max total xp or level | - |
| `type` | `string` | Yes | Did they reach max total level or max total xp | 2 options (see autocomplete) |
| `message_id` | `string` | Yes | The message id of when they got it | - |

## /rp user_event max

**Usage**

- `/rp user_event max user:<user> type:<string> skill:<string> message_id:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `user` | `user` | Yes | The user that reached max total xp or level | - |
| `type` | `string` | Yes | Did they reach max level or max xp | 2 options (see autocomplete) |
| `skill` | `string` | Yes | What skill? | - |
| `message_id` | `string` | Yes | The message id of when they got it | - |
